key_risks: Regulatory scrutiny in compliance, data privacy, and financial reporting
Market volatility due to economic fluctuations and catastrophic events
Competitive pressures from traditional brokers and insurtech startups
Dependence on key relationships with retail brokers, agents, and insurers
Reputation risks from disputes over claims handling or underwriting decisions

sources.title: Ryan Specialty Hires Sara Kendall as Deputy Chief Compliance Officer
sources.snippet: April 20, 2023 | CHICAGO, IL - Ryan Specialty Holdings, Inc. (NYSE: RYAN) ("Ryan Specialty"), a leading international specialty insurance firm, is pleased to announce that Sara Kendall has joined Ryan Specialty as Deputy Chief Compliance Officer. Sara will support and assist with managing the firm's global strategic initiatives on ethics, compliance, privacy and risk management.
